channel.title: Buildings on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Buildings on ZooBerry

item.title: Aquatic Adventure Pack
item.description: Aquatic Adventure Pack featuring paths, gazebos, restaurants, and more.

item.title: Japanese Mini Pack
item.description: A Japanese-themed pack with paths and objects for your zoo.

item.title: Snow Tiger Easter Pack 2
item.description: Snow Tigers Easter Contest Pack 2 with Easter-themed objects and animals.

item.title: Island Excursions
item.description: Embark upon an excursion to travel the oceans in search of tropical paradise! Discover the isles hiding within the Hawaiian Islands and Papua New Guinea, seeing such animals as the Hawaiian Monk Seal and the Northern Cassowary as they live in their lush and vibrant homes.

item.title: Buildings
item.description: Functional buildings such as food stands, carts, restaurants, etc.

item.title: UFO Ride
item.description: A gravitron for ZT1!

item.title: Desert Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Grassland Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Savannah Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Scrub Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Tundra Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: The Christmas Pack
item.description: Merry Christmas! The Christmas Pack is a collection of mods for Zoo Tycoon 2 that expound a winter theme.

item.title: The Christmas Pack 2: 7 Reasons to Celebrate
item.description: Merry Christmas! The Christmas Pack - 7 Reasons to Celebrate is the sequel to the collection of mods for Zoo Tycoon 2 that expound a winter theme.

item.title: Zoo Tycoon 2: Operation Genesis - Part 1
item.description: A pack containing various buildings, scenery and foliage imported from JPOG.

item.title: Buildings
item.description: Functional buildings such as food stands, carts, restaurants, etc.

item.title: Churro Stand
item.description: Churros are a fun Mexican pastry with lots of sugar!

item.title: European Expeditions [Realistic]
item.description: A user-made expansion pack made by Hendrix!

item.title: Balloon Animal Stand
item.description: A balloon animal stand with custom vendor animations made by Goosifer.

item.title: Hotdog Stand
item.description: Pictured is a hotdog stand, conqueror of all lands before lands were even lands.

item.title: Emperor Heavenly Compound Luxury Apt
item.description: Tile:Heavenly Compound:5x5,Luxury Apartment:3x3, Water placeable, Exhibit placeable(Animals don’t feel happy or unhappy)

item.title: AOE2 World Wonders
item.description: Scenery pack with buildings from around the world.

item.title: AOE2 Houses
item.description: Scenery buildings from AOE2. Eastern European, East Asia, Middle Eastern, New World and Western European

item.title: Gardens of Time Mini London Clock Tower
item.description: Imported from Gardens of Time.

item.title: Insect House With Ant and the Hercules Beetle
item.description: Scenery Objects, Tile:4x5, Water placeable, Exhibit placeable(Animals don’t feel happy or unhappy)

item.title: Emperor Chinese Magnificent Palace
item.description: A big scenery building imported from Emperor. Water placeable, exhibit placeable. Animals don’t feel happy or unhappy.

item.title: AOE2 Viking Ship
item.description: 3x3, Water placeable, Exhibit placeable(Animals don’t feel happy or unhappy)
